metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6816 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Mozilla Bleach before 3.12, a mutation XSS in bleach.clean when RCDATA and either svg or math tags are whitelisted and the keyword argument strip=False.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-6816` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-bleach - 3.2.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-bleach package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.1-2').
